dt: {bc}feeling perfect assurance sometimes on inadequate grounds

pt: {sc}sure{/sc} {sc}certain{/sc} {sc}positive{/sc} {sc}cocksure{/sc} mean having no doubt or uncertainty. {sc}sure{/sc} usually stresses the subjective or intuitive feeling of assurance.

pt.t: felt {it}sure{/it} that I had forgotten something

pt: {sc}certain{/sc} may apply to a basing of a conclusion or conviction on definite grounds or indubitable evidence.

pt.t: police are {it}certain{/it} about the cause of the fire

pt: {sc}positive{/sc} intensifies sureness or certainty and may imply opinionated conviction or forceful expression of it.

pt.t: I'm {it}positive{/it} that's the person I saw

shortdef: feeling perfect assurance sometimes on inadequate grounds
marked by overconfidence or presumptuousness : cocky
